title: WTF
body: So im silver 5 won 2 games and now it says im back in ranked placements. anyone know why its saying this????

replies.body: There is currently a maintenance going on, and your profile may show as placements until it's over.  It's only a display issue!  We'll have updates posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.   All is well!

This is likely due to Riot disabling the Leagues (ranked) system since they are currently performing maintenance. For now, you will be unable to view your rank or ranked stats. I'm guessing this will be fixed once the maintenance is done.
